alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 5:28PM CDT until March 16 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... South central Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Daisy to 4 miles east of Lane, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Antlers... Clayton... Albion... Clayton Lake State Park... Snow... Tuskahoma... Stanley... Moyers... Nashoba... Kiamichi... Kosoma... Kellond... Dunbar... Cloudy... Eubanks... Darwin... Finley... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
